attributes.action: Force sky to let Virgin Media (NTL/Telewest) have access to Sky One
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Virgin Media have just announced that sky will no longer be allowing Vigin re tranmit Sky One to their customers.

This will effectively remove all competition from the Digital TV market and cause massive disruption to the lives of NTL and Telewest customers.

Sky should be forced to give Virgin Media access to Sky One for a nominal charge, especially since sky receive advertising revenue from the channel anyway.

If this doesn't happen most Virgin/NTL/Telewest customers will be forced to switched to sky.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
